pageContext.claim: “Obama Administration legalized bump stocks. BAD IDEA. As I promised, today the Department of Justice will issue the rule banning BUMP STOCKS with a mandated comment period. We will BAN all devices that turn legal weapons into illegal machine guns.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump gets this wrong. Bump stocks were also being sold, and the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms under Obama decided in 2010 that bump stocks did not come under their regulatory authority. The Trump-era ATF concluded the same thing in 2017.
